works.description:
Dear Google -
I'm the President of a 3rd Party Logistics firm called 3LINX. We are a legitimate company headquartered at 6390 Hedgewood Drive, Suite 200, Allentown, PA 18106 and have been in business since 2002. My father Aley Raza and I started the company.

I just came across a website, 3PL Service (http://3pl-service.com) that has COPIED a previous version of our entire website, replaced all instances of "3LINX" with "3PL Service" and are continuing to modify the site.

E.g: 
- On their home page, the image they show is something our designers created.
- The featured client they show "InfoComm International" has been a 3LINX client since 2002.
- All the questions and answers on the FAQ page, I wrote personally.
- The entire "About Us" section is a copy of our history, in most cases verbatim.
- The "Management" page shows a father-son team. I went to Carnegie Mellon, got a degree in economics and joined Putnam Investments; yet is shows the fictitious son David Cotton doing the same.
- All the clients on the "Testimonials" page are 3LINX clients.
